title: The Power of Vulnerability
speaker: Brené Brown
description: Brené Brown studies human connection — our ability to empathize, belong, and love.

title: How Great Leaders Inspire Action
speaker: Simon Sinek
description: Simon Sinek explains how great leaders inspire action through a Golden Circle pattern.

title: Your Body Language Shapes Who You Are
speaker: Amy Cuddy
description: Amy Cuddy shows how body language affects confidence, success, and hormone levels.

title: The Puzzle of Motivation
speaker: Dan Pink
description: Dan Pink talks about the science of motivation and why rewards don't work as expected.

title: Inside the Mind of a Master Procrastinator
speaker: Tim Urban
description: Tim Urban humorously explains procrastination and how deadlines affect productivity.

title: The Danger of a Single Story
speaker: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
description: A powerful talk on stereotypes and the danger of hearing only a single story.

title: What Makes a Good Life?
speaker: Robert Waldinger
description: A study about adult happiness and what truly makes a good life.

title: Do Schools Kill Creativity?
speaker: Ken Robinson
description: Ken Robinson argues that schools suppress creativity and need transformation.

title: The Art of Being Yourself
speaker: Caroline McHugh
description: Caroline McHugh describes the art of being your true, authentic self.

title: The Happy Secret to Better Work
speaker: Shawn Achor
description: Shawn Achor explains how happiness fuels productivity at work.
